content.p: Key advice and information about searching for jobs abroad Students and graduates of the university have free access to GoinGlobal, an international database of careers information with: Go to GoinGlobal under the key advice link opposite or on the continent pages below. You will need to log into MyCareer using your usual UoN username and password. Hear from employers and alumni about careers in your home country telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
